long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Personalize any website’s theme with your own styles. Complete Web Theme Customizer allows you to modify background images, colors, text colors, button styles, and more, making your browsing experience truly unique.

Key Features:
Background Customization:

Background Images: Choose and apply your own background images for any website.
Background Colors: Select and apply solid background colors.
Animated GIFs: Use animated GIFs as backgrounds to bring your pages to life.
Position and Size Control:

Background Position: Adjust the position of your background image (top left, center, bottom right, etc.).
Background Size: Define the size of the background image (cover, contain, custom, etc.).
Repetition and Scrolling Settings:

Repetition: Configure the repetition of the background image (repeat, no-repeat, repeat horizontally, repeat vertically).
Background Attachment: Choose whether the background image scrolls with the page or remains fixed.
Text Color Customization:

Text Colors: Modify the color of text across the page.
Title Colors: Adjust the colors of headings (h1, h2, h3, etc.).
Link Colors: Change the color of links to make them more visible or aesthetic.
Button Customization:

Button Background Color: Set the background color of buttons.
Button Text Color: Modify the color of button text.
Button Border Color: Customize the border color of buttons.
Input Field Customization:

Input Background Color: Change the background color of text, email, password, etc.
Input Text Color: Adjust the color of text in input fields.
Language Selection:

Multilingual Support: Change the plugin's interface language (English, French, Spanish).
User-Friendly Interface:

Toggle Plugin: Enable or disable the plugin with a simple toggle button.
File Support: Upload image files directly from your computer.
How to Use:
Installation and Setup:

Install the plugin from the Chrome Web Store.
Open the plugin by clicking the icon in the toolbar.
Select a Background:

Choose an image or color background from the dropdown menu.
Upload an image of your choice or select a color using the color picker.
Advanced Adjustments:

Define the position, size, and repetition behavior of the background.
Customize text, title, link, button, and input field colors for each website.
Apply Changes:

Click the apply button to instantly see the changes on the page.
Save and Persist:

All customizations are automatically saved and applied during future visits to the customized sites.

Required Permissions:
ActiveTab: Allows the plugin to access the currently active tab to apply customizations.
Storage: Used to store customization settings and preferences locally.
Scripting: Needed to execute scripts and apply styles on web pages.
